title.rendered: Tips for Hiring a Tax Resolution Firm

content.rendered: IRS issues can be complicated to solve on your own. Understandably, many people look to find a professional tax firm for help.  But some tax companies are better qualified than others. affordable CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang provide helpful tips on how to find a truly qualified tax firm and some red flags taxpayers should look out for.
